mapper.insert: insert into db_pricelist (SID, PRODUCTID, SHOPTYPEID, SELLPRICE, EXPRESSFEE, ITEMNO, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, CORPID) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expressfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_pricelist set PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLPRICE = #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPRESSFEE = #{expressfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEMNO = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE7 = #{reserve7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE8 = #{reserve8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, PRODUCTID, SHOPTYPEID, SELLPRICE, EXPRESSFEE, ITEMNO, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, CORPID from db_pricelist where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SID, PRODUCTID, SHOPTYPEID, SELLPRICE, EXPRESSFEE, ITEMNO, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, CORPID from db_pricelist
